data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Win32::SoundRec is based upon Win32::MCI::Basic, which allows you
    to interface with the MCI directly. This module will provide an
    objectclass to record audio, save it and determine the
    recordingparameters. Optionally you can also play the sound (which
    can also be done with Win32::Sound)
